title: Dell Laptops w/Extended Warranty
product: Dell Laptops (Latitude 5550) and Dell Thunderbolt 4 Docks
bid_summary: This Request for Proposal (RFP) from the State of Maryland Treasurer's Office seeks bids for Dell Laptops with Extended Warranty. The solicitation includes Dell Latitude 5550 laptops (which must be Microsoft Copilot ready) and Dell Thunderbolt 4 Docks (model WD22TB4). The closing date for submissions is June 10, 2024.
product_specification: The solicitation requires Dell Latitude 5550 laptops, specified as Microsoft Copilot ready. Additionally, Dell Thunderbolt 4 Docks, model WD22TB4, are required.
